newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spain's Corporacion Banesto posts Q1 profit.
newsitem.headline: Spain's Corporacion Banesto posts Q1 profit.

text.p: Spain's Corporacion Banesto said on Tuesday its first quarter attributable profit was 15.09 billion pesetas versus a loss of 3.5 billion pesetas in the year-ago period.
Corporacion Banesto is part of the Banco Espanol de Credito (Banesto) group.
The statement added that as in 1995 and 1996, Corporacion Banesto intends to pay back 30 billion pesetas to shareholders, with a reduction in shareholders' funds.
Profit was increased by extraordinary results due to sale of around 35 percent of Asturiana del Zinc in January and February.
But according to Bank of Spain regulations this capital gain cannot be passed over to the Banesto parent, the note said.
Following are consolidated results, in billion pesetas unless stated:
